metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for developer productivity

plugins.name: ruby-rails
plugins.description: Ruby on Rails development toolkit with skills for Rails, Ruby, RSpec, RuboCop, SimpleCov, Brakeman, and code review with Sandi Metz principles

plugins.name: ghpm
plugins.description: GitHub Project Management workflow for product development: PRD creation, epic/task breakdown, TDD execution, and QA planning

plugins.name: js-ts
plugins.description: JavaScript and TypeScript development toolkit with ESLint, Vitest, and unit testing best practices

plugins.name: devops
plugins.description: DevOps and infrastructure toolkit with GitHub Actions, Kamal deployment, and Tailscale VPN configuration

plugins.name: general
plugins.description: General development utilities including Mermaid diagram creation for software documentation
